backend/main.mo: Defines actor with user, ticket, withdrawal, layanan, and task data structures plus access control, superadmin logic, and various user management queries/mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking feature requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for numerous frontend files describing their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Configures global Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing root div and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes for all pages including dashboards, auth pages, and landing components.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Footer: Simple footer displaying logo and copyright text.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Header: Responsive header with logo variants and navigation buttons for login, scroll, and partner registration.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Hero.t: Hero section with image, marketing text, CTA button scrolling to layanan, and WhatsApp link.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/JoinTe: Renders a call-to-action section inviting users to join the team and navigates to the partner registration page.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Landin: Builds the main landing page with hero content, service phases, scroll-to-section behavior, and multiple subcomponents.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/layana: Exports structured service data including pricing, descriptions, benefits, and contact links.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Layana: Displays an accordion-based list of services using predefined data and includes CTA buttons linking to WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/asistenku/Penutu: Shows a simple closing message reinforcing service quality.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login/logout handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for themes and UI elements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query and identity providers before rendering the root component.
Renders an admin dashboard with tabbed sections, placeholders, and a simple header and footer.
frontend/src/pages/asistenmu/AsistenmuDa: Dashboard untuk asisten yang menampilkan ringkasan statistik dan tab navigasi dengan berbagai form input.
frontend/src/pages/client/ClientDashboar: Dashboard client berisi ringkasan task, catatan pribadi, dan navigasi tab untuk berbagai fitur.
frontend/src/pages/client/LoginClient.ts: Halaman login client dengan tombol masuk simulasi dan navigasi ke dashboard atau pendaftaran.
frontend/src/pages/client/RegisterClient: Halaman pendaftaran client yang mengirim data profil ke backend dan menampilkan konfirmasi setelah submit.
frontend/src/pages/concierge/ConciergeDa: Dashboard concierge dengan tab navigasi untuk berbagai kategori tiket, semuanya masih placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/finance/FinanceDashbo: Dashboard finance dengan tab earnings, withdraw, export, dan log, seluruhnya masih placeholder.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalLogi: Handles Internet Identity login, superadmin claiming, and role-based workspace navigation with status checks and error toasts.
frontend/src/pages/internal/InternalRegi: Provides internal user registration via Internet Identity, saving profiles to the backend and showing a submission confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/management/Management: Displays a management dashboard with tabbed placeholder sections such as Summary, GMV, Margin, and Statistik.
frontend/src/pages/manajer/ManajerDashbo: Shows a manager dashboard containing Monitoring, Approval, and Log tabs, each currently with placeholder content.
Renders a partner login page with a placeholder Internet Identity login and navigation to dashboard or registration.
frontend/src/pages/partner/PartnerDashbo: Provides the partner dashboard UI including earnings summary and multiple tabs for profile, tasks, history, and wallet.
frontend/src/pages/partner/RegisterPartn: Implements partner registration by saving a profile via actor then showing a confirmation screen.
frontend/src/pages/strategicpartner/Stra: Renders the strategic partner dashboard with a header, footer, and tabbed sections that currently show placeholder content.
frontend/src/pages/superadmin/Superadmin: Implements the superadmin dashboard with tabs, user fetching via actor methods, pending user filtering, and activation handling for client and partner accounts.
frontend/src/utils/internalRoleRouting.t: Maps internal role keys to dashboard routes and provides helpers for checking and listing routable roles.
frontend/src/utils/internalRoles.ts: Defines all internal roles with labels and exposes helpers for retrieving role labels.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme, colors, extensions, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes the current project state, including frontend-only requirements for user activation, role handling, and registration behavior.
